mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `Mybox_audit` (mybox_id, actor_userNm, action, object_key_enc, file_name_enc, size_bytes, checksum_sha256, s3_etag, s3_version_id, actor_ip, user_agent, detail) VALUES (#{myboxId}, #{actorUserNm}, #{action}, #{objectKeyEnc}, #{fileNameEnc}, #{sizeBytes}, #{checksumSha256}, #{s3Etag}, #{s3VersionId}, #{actorIp}, #{userAgent}, #{detail})
